item.title: Barnyard2: Data too long
item.description: After I logged into Snorby to check some events on our IDS. I notice that one of my sensors didn’t return any events any more into the database. I log in the sensors and I notice that Barnyard2 wasn’t running any more. Barnyard2 parses the Snort logs and inserts the min the database. So I started the service again and after a few minutes it stoped running again. Upon inspection of the logs I fount this warning.
